@@info: Here are translations that exist in <en> but not in <zh-TW>.
After editing this file, you can run 'dart run slang apply --locale=zh-TW' to quickly apply the newly added translations.

sanitization.invalid: 檔案名稱包含無效字元。

web.tooManyAttempts: 嘗試次數過多，請稍後再試。
